text: The 2008–09 Odense Boldklub season was the club's 121th season, and their 48th appearance in the Danish Superliga. As well as the Superliga, they competed in the Ekstra Bladet Cup. == First team == :Last updated on 1 May 2009 {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:80%" |- !style="background:#0000ff; color:white; text-align:center"|Squad no. !style="background:#0000ff; color:white; text-align:center"|Name !style="background:#0000ff; color:white; text-align:center"|Nationality !style="background:#0000ff; color:white; text-align:center"|Position !style="background:#0000ff; color:white; text-align:center"|Date of birth (age) |- !colspan="6" style="background:#dcdcdc; text-align:center"| Goalkeepers |- |1 |Arek Onyszko | |GK | |- |16 |David Preece | |GK | |- |35 |Christian Kier | |GK | |- !colspan="6" style="background:#dcdcdc; text- align:center"| Defenders |- |2 |Espen Ruud | |RB | |- |3 |Atle Roar Håland | |CB | |- |5 |Anders Møller Christensen | |CB | |- |6 |Thomas Helveg | |RB/CB | |- |15 |Chris Sørensen (captain) | |LB/CB | |- |18 |Jonas Troest | |CB | |- |20 |Timmi Johansen | |LB | |- !colspan="6" style="background:#dcdcdc; text- align:center"| Midfielders |- |4 |Hans Henrik Andreasen | |CM/RM | |- |8 |Henrik Hansen | |CM/AM | |- |11 |Johan Absalonsen | |LM/LW | |- |14 |Esben Hansen | |CM/DM | |- |17 |Morten Bisgaard | |CM | |- |19 |Eric Djemba-Djemba | |DM | |- |21 |Peter Nymann | |RM | |- |25 |Oliver Feldballe | |LM/AM | |- !colspan="6" style="background:#dcdcdc; text-align:center"| Forwards |- |7 |Peter Utaka | |ST | |- |10 |Björn Runström | |ST | |- |22 |Njogu Demba-Nyrén | |ST | |- |28 |Anders K.
